name: Mine Games (Jake Rowe)
description:
Mine Games is a "clicker hell" and combines elements of Devil Daggers with an endless runner. Developed as a student project back in June, Mine Games was my first experience of using C# as part of the programming unit in first year.

An updated version of the original prototype, I've added in some polish, audio and art assets but haven't touched the mechanics. Please note that detection on the projectiles is occasionally off. 

Thank you for checking this out and feel free to share your thoughts below!
